name: Aria: Dragon Eater
description:
"Aria: Dragon Eater" is a fantasy action top-down shooter game set in a magical era.
Begin your journey to unravel the mystery surrounding the death of the dragon and the Grand Magister.
​

Aria: Dragon Eater is a top-down fantasy action game full of endless enemies, fireballs and magic.
You have to use all kinds of magic, including teleport, fireball, meteo teleportation, and flame ray to break through the ruthless enemies and move forward.
Set in the fantasy age of dragons, you have to struggle to uncover the whole story of what happened at the Dragon Tower.
Overcome many moments of challenge through quickness, wisdom, and the right choice whenever you reach your limit.


In the era of peaceful coexistence between dragons and humans, the Blue Dragon, which was considered a good and sacred being, begins to attack humans.

The kingdom catches the Blue Dragon and traps it in the "Dragon Tower" and begins to "protect" it.


One day, the Grand Magister who guards the tower and the sacred Blue Dragon are found dead, and one of the important guardians of the "Dragon Tower", Aria, is hunted down as the Dragon Killer.


Is Aria, who lost her memory, really a dragon killer?



Start the journey to solve the mystery!
